sentences.sContent: There’s a nasty bug going round (=  that a lot of people have caught  ) .
sentences.sCn: 现在流行着一种很烦人的传染病。

sentences.sContent: ...including some bug sprays and cleaning fluids...

words.tran: 装窃听器；打扰；把…弄糊涂；除虫（bug的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 虫子；小病；故障，缺陷；窃听器
trans.tranOther: an illness that people catch very easily from each other but is not very serious

trans.tranCn: 烦扰， 纠缠； 在…装窃听器
trans.tranOther: to put a  bug (=  small piece of electronic equipment  )  somewhere secretly in order to listen to conversations
